subject: Baseball
Free Agents (Sports)
Trades (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Scherzer, the former American League Cy Young Award winner, has been engaged in contract talks with the Washington Nationals, who could have an overpowering rotation if he signs.
snippet: Scherzer, the former American League Cy Young Award winner, has been engaged in contract talks with the Washington Nationals, who could have an overpowering rotation if he signs.
